45enum ControlKnobs

49 KNOB_MIX,

51 KNOB_BLUR,
52 KNOB_WARP,
53 KNOB_LAST,
54};

99enum Leds
100{
101 LED_REVERSE,
102 LED_FREEZE,
103 LED_1,
104 LED_2,
105 LED_3,
106 LED_4,
107 LED_5,
108 LED_6,
109 LED_BOT_1,
110 LED_BOT_2,
111 LED_BOT_3,
112 LED_LAST,
113};
114
119struct CalibrationData
120{
121 CalibrationData() : warp_scale(60.f), warp_offset(0.f), cv_offset{0.f} {}
122 float warp_scale, warp_offset;
123 float cv_offset[CV_LAST];
124
126 bool operator==(const CalibrationData &rhs)
127 {
128 if(warp_scale != rhs.warp_scale)
129 {
130 return false;
131 }
132 else if(warp_offset != rhs.warp_offset)
133 {
134 return false;
135 }
136 else
137 {
138 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
139 {
140 if(cv_offset[i] != rhs.cv_offset[i])
141 return false;
142 }
143 }
144 return true;
145 }
146
148 bool operator!=(const CalibrationData &rhs) { return !operator==(rhs); }
149};
150
158class Hardware
159{
160 public:
164 Hardware() {}
165
169 ~Hardware() {}
170
178 void Init(bool boost = true)
179 {
180 seed.Init(boost);
181 hw_version = GetBoardRevision();
182 ConfigureAudio();
183 ConfigureControls();
184 ConfigureLeds();
185 seed.adc.Start();
186 SetAudioSampleRate(daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ);
187 SetAudioBlockSize(96);
188 UpdateHidRates();
189
190 LoadCalibrationData();
191 cal_save_flag_ = false;
192 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
193 {
194 cv_offsets_[i] = 0.f;
195 }
196 }
197
202 void StartAudio(daisy::AudioHandle::AudioCallback cb)
203 {
204 current_cb_ = cb;
205 seed.StartAudio(cb);
206 }
207
209 void ChangeAudioCallback(daisy::AudioHandle::AudioCallback cb)
210 {
211 current_cb_ = cb;
212 seed.ChangeAudioCallback(cb);
213 }
214
216 void StartAudio(daisy::AudioHandle::InterleavingAudioCallback cb)
217 {
218 seed.StartAudio(cb);
219 }
220
222 void ChangeAudioCallback(daisy::AudioHandle::InterleavingAudioCallback cb)
223 {
224 seed.ChangeAudioCallback(cb);
225 }
226
235 void StartLowPriorityCallback(daisy::TimerHandle::PeriodElapsedCallback cb,
236 uint32_t target_freq,
237 void *data = nullptr)
238 {
239 daisy::TimerHandle::Config timcfg;
240 timcfg.periph = daisy::TimerHandle::Config::Peripheral::TIM_5;
241 timcfg.dir = daisy::TimerHandle::Config::CounterDir::UP;
242 auto tim_base_freq = daisy::System::GetPClk2Freq();
243 auto tim_target_freq = target_freq;
244 auto tim_period = tim_base_freq / tim_target_freq;
245 timcfg.period = tim_period;
246 timcfg.enable_irq = true;
247 tim5_handle.Init(timcfg);
248 tim5_handle.SetCallback(cb, data);
250 tim5_handle.Start();
251 }
252
259 void ChangeSampleRate(int sr)
260 {
261 daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate srval;
262 size_t new_blocksize = 96;
263 switch(sr)
264 {
265 case 16000:
266 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_16KHZ;
267 break;
268 case 32000:
269 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_32KHZ;
270 break;
271 case 48000:
272 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
273 break;
274 case 96000:
275 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_96KHZ;
276 new_blocksize = 48;
277 break;
278 default:
279 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
280 break;
281 }
282 seed.StopAudio();
283 seed.SetAudioSampleRate(srval);
284 seed.SetAudioBlockSize(new_blocksize);
285 seed.StartAudio(current_cb_);
286 }
287
289 void StopAudio() { seed.StopAudio(); }
290
294 void SetAudioSampleRate(daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate samplerate)
295 {
296 seed.SetAudioSampleRate(samplerate);
297 }
298
303 void SetAudioSampleRate(int samplerate)
304 {
305 daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate srval;
306 switch(samplerate)
307 {
308 case 16000:
309 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_16KHZ;
310 break;
311 case 32000:
312 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_32KHZ;
313 break;
314 case 48000:
315 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
316 break;
317 case 96000:
318 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_96KHZ;
319 break;
320 default:
321 srval = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
322 break;
323 }
324 seed.SetAudioSampleRate(srval);
325 }
326
328 float AudioSampleRate() { return seed.audio_handle.GetSampleRate(); }
329
331 void SetAudioBlockSize(size_t blocksize)
332 {
333 seed.SetAudioBlockSize(blocksize);
334 }
335
337 size_t AudioBlockSize() { return seed.AudioBlockSize(); }
338
340 float AudioCallbackRate() const { return seed.AudioCallbackRate(); }
341
343 void SetTestLed(bool state) { seed.SetLed(state); }
344
350 void ClearLeds()
351 {
352 for(int i = 0; i < LED_LAST; i++)
353 {
354 SetLed((Leds)i, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
355 }
356 }
357
363 void WriteLeds() { led_driver_.SwapBuffersAndTransmit(); }
364
371 void SetLed(Leds idx, float r, float g, float b)
372 {
373 LedIdx led = LedMap[idx];
374 if(led.r != -1)
375 led_driver_.SetLed(led.r, r);
376 led_driver_.SetLed(led.g, g);
377 led_driver_.SetLed(led.b, b);
378 }
379
383 void ProcessAllControls()
384 {
385 ProcessAnalogControls();
386 ProcessDigitalControls();
387 }
388
392 void ProcessDigitalControls()
393 {
394 for(int i = 0; i < SW_LAST; i++)
395 {
396 switches[i].Debounce();
397 }
398 }
399
403 void ProcessAnalogControls()
404 {
405 for(int i = 0; i < KNOB_LAST; i++)
406 {
407 controls[i].Process();
408 }
409
410 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
411 {
412 cv[i].Process();
413 }
414 }
418 inline float GetKnobValue(int ctrl) const { return controls[ctrl].Value(); }
419
425 inline const daisy::Switch &GetButton(int idx) const
426 {
427 return switches[idx];
428 }
429
435 inline bool GetGateTrig(int idx) { return gates[idx].Trig(); }
436
440 inline bool GetGateState(int idx) { return gates[idx].State(); }
441
443 void UpdateHidRates()
444 {
445 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
446 {
447 cv[i].SetSampleRate(AudioCallbackRate());
448 }
449 for(int i = 0; i < KNOB_LAST; i++)
450 {
451 controls[i].SetSampleRate(AudioCallbackRate());
452 }
453 for(int i = 0; i < SW_LAST; i++)
454 {
455 switches[i].SetUpdateRate(AudioCallbackRate());
456 }
457 }
458
468 void PrepareMedia(
469 daisy::USBHostHandle::ConnectCallback connect_cb = nullptr,
470 daisy::USBHostHandle::DisconnectCallback disconnect_cb = nullptr,
471 daisy::USBHostHandle::ClassActiveCallback class_active_cb = nullptr,
472 daisy::USBHostHandle::ErrorCallback error_cb = nullptr,
473 void *userdata = nullptr)
474 {
476 daisy::USBHostHandle::Config usbcfg;
477 usbcfg.connect_callback = connect_cb;
478 usbcfg.disconnect_callback = disconnect_cb;
479 usbcfg.class_active_callback = class_active_cb;
480 usbcfg.error_callback = error_cb;
481 usbcfg.userdata = userdata;
482 usb.Init(usbcfg);
483
485 daisy::FatFSInterface::Config fsi_cfg;
486 fsi_cfg.media = daisy::FatFSInterface::Config::MEDIA_USB;
487 fatfs_interface.Init(fsi_cfg);
488 f_mount(&fatfs_interface.GetUSBFileSystem(),
489 fatfs_interface.GetUSBPath(),
490 0);
491 }
492
496 inline float GetWarpVoct()
497 {
498 return voct_cal.ProcessInput(cv[CV_WARP].Value());
499 }
500
507 inline float GetCvValue(int cv_idx)
508 {
509 if(cv_idx != CV_WARP)
510 return cv[cv_idx].Value() - cv_offsets_[cv_idx];
511 else
512 return cv[cv_idx].Value();
513 }
514
520 void DelayMs(size_t del) { seed.DelayMs(del); }
521
523 inline void CalibrateV1(float v1) { warp_v1_ = v1; }
524
528 inline void CalibrateV3(float v3)
529 {
530 warp_v3_ = v3;
531 voct_cal.Record(warp_v1_, warp_v3_);
532 cal_save_flag_ = true;
533 }
534
538 inline void SetWarpCalData(float scale, float offset)
539 {
540 voct_cal.SetData(scale, offset);
541 }
542
546 inline void GetWarpCalData(float &scale, float &offset)
547 {
548 voct_cal.GetData(scale, offset);
549 }
550
552 inline void SetCvOffsetData(float *data)
553 {
554 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
555 {
556 cv_offsets_[i] = data[i];
557 }
558 }
559
561 inline void GetCvOffsetData(float *data)
562 {
563 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
564 {
565 data[i] = cv_offsets_[i];
566 }
567 }
568
570 inline bool ReadyToSaveCal() const { return cal_save_flag_; }
571
573 inline void ClearSaveCalFlag() { cal_save_flag_ = false; }

599 struct LedIdx
600 {
601 int8_t r;
602 int8_t g;
603 int8_t b;
604 };
605
607 const LedIdx LedMap[LED_LAST] = {{0, 1, 2},
608 {3, 4, 5},
609 {6, 7, 8},
610 {9, 10, 11},
611 {16, 17, 18},
612 {12, 13, 14},
613 {22, 23, 24},
614 {28, 29, 30},
615 {-1, 20, 21},
616 {-1, 26, 27},
617 {-1, 19, 25}};

620 enum class HardwareVersion
621 {
622 REV3,
623 REV4,
624 };
625
626
628 daisy::LedDriverPca9685<2, true> led_driver_;
629
631 daisy::AudioHandle::AudioCallback current_cb_;
632
633 daisy::TimerHandle tim5_handle;
634 daisy::I2CHandle i2c;
635 daisy::Pcm3060 codec;
636
637 HardwareVersion hw_version;
638
640 float warp_v1_, warp_v3_;
641 daisy::VoctCalibration voct_cal;
642 float cv_offsets_[CV_LAST];

646
647 void ConfigureAudio()
648 {
650 if(hw_version == HardwareVersion::REV3)
651 {
652 daisy::I2CHandle::Config codec_i2c_config;
653 codec_i2c_config.periph
654 = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Peripheral::I2C_1;
655 codec_i2c_config.pin_config = {seed.GetPin(11), seed.GetPin(12)};
656 codec_i2c_config.speed
657 = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Speed::I2C_400KHZ;
658 codec_i2c_config.mode = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Mode::I2C_MASTER;
659
660 i2c.Init(codec_i2c_config);
661 codec.Init(i2c);
662
663 daisy::SaiHandle::Config sai_cfg;
664 sai_cfg.periph = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Peripheral::SAI_2;
665 sai_cfg.sr = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
666 sai_cfg.bit_depth = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::BitDepth::SAI_24BIT;
667 sai_cfg.a_sync = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Sync::SLAVE;
668 sai_cfg.b_sync = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Sync::MASTER;
669 sai_cfg.a_dir = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Direction::RECEIVE;
670 sai_cfg.b_dir = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::Direction::TRANSMIT;
671 sai_cfg.pin_config.fs = seed.GetPin(27);
672 sai_cfg.pin_config.mclk = seed.GetPin(24);
673 sai_cfg.pin_config.sck = seed.GetPin(28);
674 sai_cfg.pin_config.sa = seed.GetPin(26);
675 sai_cfg.pin_config.sb = seed.GetPin(25);
676 // Then Initialize
677 daisy::SaiHandle sai_2_handle;
678 sai_2_handle.Init(sai_cfg);
679 daisy::AudioHandle::Config audio_cfg;
680 audio_cfg.blocksize = 48;
681 audio_cfg.samplerate
682 = daisy::SaiHandle::Config::SampleRate::SAI_48KHZ;
683 audio_cfg.postgain = 1.0f;
684 seed.audio_handle.Init(audio_cfg, sai_2_handle);
685 }
686 else
687 {
689 daisy::GPIO deemp;
690 daisy::Pin deemp_pin(daisy::PORTB, 11);
691 deemp.Init(deemp_pin, daisy::GPIO::Mode::OUTPUT);
692 deemp.Write(0);
693 }
694 }
695
696 // pots,switches, gates, CV
697 void ConfigureControls()
698 {
699 if(hw_version == HardwareVersion::REV3)
700 {
701 // ===== CV and Pots (adc) =====
702 daisy::AdcChannelConfig cfg[CV_LAST + 1];
703
704 for(int i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
705 {
706 cfg[i].InitSingle(seed.GetPin(17 + i));
707 }
708 cfg[CV_LAST].InitMux(seed.GetPin(16),
709 6,
710 seed.GetPin(7),
711 seed.GetPin(8),
712 seed.GetPin(9));
713 seed.adc.Init(cfg, CV_LAST + 1);
714
715 // init cv as bipolar analog controls
716 for(size_t i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
717 {
718 cv[i].InitBipolarCv(seed.adc.GetPtr(i), AudioCallbackRate());
719 }
720
721 // init pots as analog controls
722 for(size_t i = 0; i < KNOB_LAST; i++)
723 {
724 controls[i].Init(seed.adc.GetMuxPtr(CV_LAST, i),
725 AudioCallbackRate());
726 }
727
728 // ===== gates =====
729 dsy_gpio_pin pin;
730 pin = seed.GetPin(23);
731 gates[GATE_FREEZE].Init(&pin);
732 }
733 else
734 {
736 daisy::AdcChannelConfig cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_LAST];
738 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_TIME].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A0);
739 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_REFLECT].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A1);
740 cfg[CV_ATMOSPHERE].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A2);
741 cfg[CV_TIME].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A3);
742 cfg[CV_MIX].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A4);
743 cfg[CV_REFLECT].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A5);
744 cfg[CV_BLUR].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A6);
745 cfg[CV_WARP].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A7);
746 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_MIX].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A8);
747 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_WARP].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A9);
748 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_ATMOSPHERE].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A10);
749 cfg[CV_LAST + KNOB_BLUR].InitSingle(daisy::seed::A11);
750 seed.adc.Init(cfg, CV_LAST + KNOB_LAST);
751
752 for(size_t i = 0; i < CV_LAST; i++)
753 {
754 cv[i].InitBipolarCv(seed.adc.GetPtr(i), AudioCallbackRate());
755 }
756 // init pots as analog controls with offset to last CV for ptr
757 for(size_t i = 0; i < KNOB_LAST; i++)
758 {
759 controls[i].Init(seed.adc.GetPtr(CV_LAST + i),
760 AudioCallbackRate());
761 }
762 dsy_gpio_pin freeze_pin = daisy::seed::D26;
763 gates[GATE_FREEZE].Init(&freeze_pin);
764 }
765 // And anything generic to both versions
766 // ===== switches =====
767 switches[SW_FREEZE].Init(seed.GetPin(1), AudioCallbackRate());
768 switches[SW_REVERSE].Init(seed.GetPin(10), AudioCallbackRate());
769 switches[SW_SHIFT].Init(seed.GetPin(13), AudioCallbackRate());
770
771 dsy_gpio_pin revpin = seed.GetPin(14);
772 gates[GATE_REVERSE].Init(&revpin);
773 }
774
775 void ConfigureLeds()
776 {
777 // reinit i2c at 1MHz
778 daisy::I2CHandle::Config codec_i2c_config;
779 codec_i2c_config.periph = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Peripheral::I2C_1;
780 codec_i2c_config.pin_config = {seed.GetPin(11), seed.GetPin(12)};
781 codec_i2c_config.speed = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Speed::I2C_1MHZ;
782 codec_i2c_config.mode = daisy::I2CHandle::Config::Mode::I2C_MASTER;
783 i2c.Init(codec_i2c_config);
784
785 // init driver
786 led_driver_.Init(i2c, {0x00, 0x01}, led_dma_buffer_a, led_dma_buffer_b);
787
788 ClearLeds();
789 WriteLeds();
790 }
791
792 HardwareVersion GetBoardRevision()
793 {
794 daisy::GPIO version_gpio;
795 version_gpio.Init(daisy::seed::D2,
796 daisy::GPIO::Mode::INPUT,
797 daisy::GPIO::Pull::PULLUP);
799 auto pinstate = version_gpio.Read();
800 version_gpio.DeInit();
801 if(pinstate)
802 return HardwareVersion::REV3;
803 else
804 return HardwareVersion::REV4;
805 }
806
808 void LoadCalibrationData()
809 {
810 daisy::PersistentStorage<CalibrationData> cal_storage(seed.qspi);
811 CalibrationData default_cal;
812 cal_storage.Init(default_cal, kCalibrationDataOffset);
813 auto &cal_data = cal_storage.GetSettings();
814 SetWarpCalData(cal_data.warp_scale, cal_data.warp_offset);
815 SetCvOffsetData(cal_data.cv_offset);
816 }
817};
818
819} // namespace aurora
